page.title: 08FAMILY LIFE.
page.content: I woke up late today I came down and mum was making the breakfast. I had my breakfast.Before breakfast we had seen a Hot-Air-Balloon. It landed In the field behind Mancroft Farm. The owner said he had to come down because he couldn't see any farther because of the fog.Then we went to Castle Cary in Aunty Audrey's car. We got some sausages and Pineapple in a tin came back and we had some dinner,we had Fish fingers and Spaggetti. After that we saw 2 Hot-Air-Balloons again. Then I turned on the television to watch "LIVE AID" I watched it till 2.00pm.We then went swimming at Yarlington.Then we had Bar-b-que after this we cooked the sausages and prepared everythig it started to rain so we sat in the alley-way while Dad cooked the food,I came in and watched "LIVE AID" until I went to bed.
